sub_title: Azure Cloud Architect at Nordcloud, an IBM company
summary:
Brief Summary:
Born and raised in Adana (1990-2008),
Graduated from Anatolian Lycée of Adana in 2008 (Adana) (2004-2008),
Improved foreign language speaking, back-office/field coordination, marketing and sales skills working at a tourism agency (Antalya) (2008-2010 seasonal),
Studied Computer Engineering in English at Maltepe University with full scholarship (Istanbul) (2008-2013),
Had Internship at an IT consultancy company (Adana) (2011-2012 seasonal),
Completed mandatory military service as a Sergeant in Merzifon (Amasya) (2013-2014),
Assisted the Minister of Telecommunications and Industry of Costa Rica Ms. Gisela Kopper during IGF 2014, that was hosted in Istanbul.
Started working at a Microsoft Gold Partner as a Cloud Solutions Specialist. (Istanbul) (2014-2016),
Promoted to Cloud Solutions Architect role (2016-2018),
Become a Partner-Technology Solutions Professional at Microsoft (Istanbul) (2016-2018),
Relocated by ZyLAB as an Azure DevOps Engineer (Amsterdam) (2018-2021),
Senior DevOps Engineer @ ValueBlue (Utrecht) (2021-7 months contract.)
Azure Cloud Engineer @ Nordcloud, an IBM Company (Amsterdam) (2021-Present)

projects.title: Dogus Media Group Datacenter Migration
projects.description: The Doğuş Media Group (DMG), the leading media company in Turkey, owns multiple local media outlets and also represents global brands such as National Geographic and Condé Nast in Turkey. To deliver a better and more consistent viewing experience across its many web properties, DMG is replatforming all its media websites using Microsoft Azure platform services. With this move, DMG has gained on-demand infrastructure scalability, uninterrupted availability, and a faster innovation cycle—all of which keeps viewers coming back for more.

projects.title: WebXBIS  Extended Business Information Systems
projects.description:
WebXBIS which is an web based low cost Extended Business Information System  for large scale SMB and corporates including features like MIS, CRM and ERP..

WebXBIS project aims to develop an BIS for target group with relatively low ownership and operational cost.

profile_positions.title: Senior DevOps Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Architecture design of highly available, scalable and robust infrastructure on Azure and deployment automation to EU and US datacenters.
- Ownership of ISO27001 certified infra and change management, powered by SoC2 Type-I report (no managed passwords or secrets, only managed identities and service principals)
- Automation of dedicated client environment onboarding and decommissioning
- ZyLAB One software deployment and graceful upgrade automation
- KeyVault, ApplicationGateway, AAD, Azure B2C, ACR, AKS deployment, managament, monitoring over LogAnalytics and ApplicationInsights
- ISO27001 certification and SoC2 reports documentation, PoC, PoE (Security policies, information security, asset management, access control, cryptography, operations security, communication security, supplier relationships)
- SoC2 Type-II preperations
- Cloud Infra & CloudOps Repo owner, AAD Global Admin, AD Enterprise Admin, SQL Server sysadmin, ZyLAB One Functional Admin, SaaS VPN and OPS workspace (RDS) provider
- StatusPage Editor
- 3rd Party Software deployment/installation (mostly on linux)
- Azure Kubernetes Services clusteradmin, Azure DevOps Project Collection Administrator, Azure KeyVault Key&Secret&Certificate Manager
- Owning valid AZ100 Azure Infrastructure & Deployment, AZ500 Microsoft Azure Security Technologies
* Deployment Automation using Az Powershell Modules and Terraform
* Pipeline Automation using YAML or UI
* Docker Enterprise experience on Windows, community experience on Linux
* Microservice management on AKS using HELM v3 via CI/CD YAML pipelines

profile_positions.title: Partner Technology Solutions Professional

profile_positions.location: Istanbul Lütfi Kırdar Convention and Exhibition Center
profile_positions.description:
During the 9th Internet Governance Forum that is hosted by United Nations, I had the honor to assist The Minister of Science, Technology and Communications of Costa Rica, Ms. Gisela Kopper.
Thanks to Her Excellencies, I spent one of the best weeks of my life, had many opportunities to meet 'Giants' of IT Sector including Vinton G. Cerf.
Beside attending regular workshops of IGF, I had the pleasure of escorting Her Excellencies during additional meetings and cocktails that are located outside of the Congress Center.
We explored Çırağan Palace, Hagia Sophia, Grand Bazaar, The Basilica Cistern, Galata Tower, Topkapı Palace, Taksim Square, Nevizade and undoubtedly, The Bosphorus on a yacht.
I deeply appreciate all the experiences I had thanks to Her and all the mentoring She kindly provided.
profile_positions.title: Host (Mihmandar)

profile_positions.description:
I started my military service in Kütahya, Air Private Training Brigade.
I was ranked as a corporal and as a sergeant next.
During my training period, I was ordered to work in the administrative office of Unit 16th, shared with Unit 15, reporting to Commander Erdi Başkaya.
I designed a new Private Transactions System using Microsoft Access 2003, created databases considering daily paper work routine, forms for additions/edits/deletions and printable reports to be signed and approved by the unit commander. All the effort of working on hardcopy is dismissed, all the reports and recruit tag book are generated digitally and more rapidly, zero mistakes.
In January, I was drafted to the Command Post of 5th Main Jet Base in Merzifon, Amasya.
I served my unit as an Administrative Office Sergeant directly reporting to Squadron Leader Erman Gülmüş.
I designed new systems to handle daily, weekly soldier document needs using Microsoft Access 2007.
Managed other sergeants to keep the track of unit routine.
Organized daily assignments of tasks.
Apart from all these, by the command of Base Commander Pilot Koray Uz, I lectured about basics of computer usage, to the soldiers that never interacted with a computer in their lives for two weeks and assessed their learning capabilities, motivations and challenges, with reports to the Base Commander. State approved certifications were handed to the successful participants, that met the acceptance criterias and passed the final quiz.
I took part in many tasks and reported everything to the unit commander till I received my official certificate on the 16th of June. My last day ever in Merzifon.
profile_positions.title: Air Infantry Sergeant

profile_positions.description: Science & Technology Club was the most active student club of Maltepe University. I would love to take part in the club since it was related to my department. I nominated myself for the board membership and I was accepted. My teammates were awesome and very open-minded people, and together we carried on the club in the best way it could have been. I had established a website (bilvetek.com/net) where we could start an online community with our club members. We offered help to our members for their homeworks and projects, in a built up forum structure. Although it was fun, we put much effort, and we had to empty our positions to give some chances to the enthusiastic newcomers.
profile_positions.title: Science and Technology Club Board Member

profile_positions.description:
I wanted to improve my English as best as I can before I attend a university. I packed my back and went to Antalya to work in tourism. I started working in Summer Tour as an airport transferman at first. After a short period of time, airport operation manager offered me to work in the area as a hotel guide. I was appointed to Romanian market in Belek region. I was responsible of the whole area for Romanian clients. Beside transfers and excursion sales, I started attending excursions with my clients. At the end of the season, I become fluent at English.
My operation manager was so satisfied of my work and asked me to come back the next season. I kept working in this position each season during my license education. I quit the job when I wanted to have some experience in my own sector, which is IT.
profile_positions.title: Transferman, Guide, Hotel Guide, Tour Operator
